ISSUE.TITLE: Please specify: Make sure your permalinks are set to “post name”.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I was trying to get WP-API to work for hours and actually gave up until I stumbled upon http://themergency.com/wordpress-rest-api/. I didn't know that I should **Make sure your permalinks are set to “post name”.** Please, please note this in capital letters in the README! You might also want to add a link to [Using Permanlinks - Choosing your permalink structure](http://codex.wordpress.org/Using_Permalinks#Choosing_your_permalink_structure) for other developers new to Wordpress.
